scripts.dev:ios: npm run prepare:instance && concurrently -k -n vite,ns "npm run dev:server:ios" "wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run ios"
scripts.dev:android: npm run prepare:instance && concurrently -k -n vite,ns "npm run dev:server:android" "wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run android"
scripts.ios: npm run prepare:instance && ns debug ios --no-hmr
scripts.android: npm run prepare:instance && ns debug android --no-hmr
scripts.build:android: npm run prepare:instance && ns build android
scripts.build:ios: npm run prepare:instance && ns build ios
